file_content.text:
Ledo Melnic has outlined the parameters for a high-priority mission in the Anchorhead sector of Tatooine. For additional details about the mission, Ledo Melnic may be contacted in-person. Otherwise, the mission may be initiated from this terminal for your convenience.
This mission may require a small group. It may be completed once per week.

Jundo Martik has outlined the parameters for a high-priority mission in the Jundland sector of Tatooine. For additional details about the mission, Jundo Martik may be contacted in-person. Otherwise, the mission may be initiated from this terminal for your convenience.
This mission may require a small group. It may be completed once per week.

Lapad Dula has outlined the parameters for a high-priority mission in the Dune Sea sector of Tatooine. For additional details about the mission, Lapad Dula may be contacted in-person. Otherwise, the mission may be initiated from this terminal for your convenience.
This mission may require a small group. It may be completed once per week.

[You log in to the Citizen's Militia network and find an urgent message:]
Alerting all responsible citizens. Posted: Sorin Schaff, the citizens' militia's chief backer, is being held captive in his own home by Twin Suns pirates.
The pirates' leader, Braigin Helk, has proved too much for militia forces. We request the help of any and all combat-trained professionals to defeat Helk and liberate the homestead.
Coordinates provided. The Citizens' Militia thanks you for your support.
"Vigilance, community, defense."

Bleb Blek has outlined the parameters for a high-priority mission in the Jundland sector of Tatooine. For additional details about the mission, Bleb Blek may be contacted in-person. Otherwise, the mission may be initiated from this terminal for your convenience.
This mission may require a small group. It may be completed once per week.

[You log in to the Citizens' Militia network and find an urgent message:]
By order of Mayor Airen and the Citizens' Militia--Geonosian attacks on Tatooine farmers and settlements have grown bold.
The Geonosians are highly coordinated, and multiple swarms are often involved in the raids. We have heard their coded signals in the night, but we are unable to interpret them.
The signals originate at their main camp. Find their signal devices, obtain the code, and bring it to Captain Sabha of the militia.
"Vigilance, community, defense."

Danbar Hue has outlined the parameters for a high-priority mission in the Jundland sector of Tatooine. For additional details about the mission, Danbar Hue may be contacted in-person. Otherwise, the mission may be initiated from this terminal for your convenience.
This mission may require a small group. It may be completed once per week.
